     KARNALYTE RESOURCES INC. ANNOUNCES RECEIPT OF STATEMENT OF CLAIM

SASKATOON, SK (CNW- February 18, 2021) – Karnalyte Resources Inc. (“Karnalyte” or the “Company”) (TSX: KRN) announced today that the Company has received a statement of claim (the “Claim”) filed by Mr. Dan Brown against Karnalyte, Frank ...
